title: 2022 Commencal Clash Kids reshapes VPP all-mountain to enduro bikes for all ages
content:
Commencal simply builds killer mountain bikes for young shredders, and the new 4-bike Clash Kids line-up looks to be their most capable yet. Built across four different wheel sizes, these four full-suspension bikes pack in 130-160mm of trail-taming VPP travel tailored for smaller riders starting from 115cm/3’9″ tall all the way up to 160cm/5’3″. And

The post 2022 Commencal Clash Kids reshapes VPP all-mountain to enduro bikes for all ages appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
